core.summary: This film depicts Jesus Christ arriving in present-day Paris, witnessing the city as it is now. He observes the contemporary world with a disillusioned gaze, yet the story unfolds with his powers. It's a two-hour film filled with nostalgia, featuring a bitter and somewhat melancholic humor.

objectives: Create a film depicting Jesus Christ arriving in present-day Paris
constraints: Tone includes nostalgia, bitter and melancholic humor
hypotheses: The film will explore themes of disillusionment with the modern world
